location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:280 x 300 mm, on sheet 382 x 384 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Heliozincographed at the Survey of India Offices, Dehra Dun. Reg. No. 307 E.D.D. ‘1925. Reproduced with the permission of the Controller of H.M. Stationery Office.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures. Depth shown by contours.General map of Lower Mesopotamia from Baghdad down to the Persian Gulf with Turco-Persian frontier indicated by dash-dot line, showing the oil springs near Maidan-i-Anftun with pipe line and the submarine telegraph cable indicated.
